parameters.query:
WITH ins AS (
  INSERT INTO kb_sources (source_name, source_type, source_path, hash)
  VALUES (
    '{{$json.filename}}',
    'pdf',
    '{{$json.src_path}}',
    '{{ ($node["Hash File (sha256sum)"]?.json?.stdout || "").split(/\s+/)[0] || "" }}'
  )
  ON CONFLICT (hash) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING source_id
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT source_id FROM ins),
    (SELECT source_id FROM kb_sources WHERE hash = '{{ ($node["Hash File (sha256sum)"]?.json?.stdout || "").split(/\s+/)[0] || "" }}')
  ) AS source_id,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM ins) AS inserted,
  '{{$json.filename}}'::text AS filename,
  '{{$json.src_path}}'::text AS src_path;

assignments.name: dest_name
clean_source_id
clean_dest_path

parameters.query:
DELETE FROM kb_chunks
 WHERE source_id = {{$json.clean_source_id}};

WITH incoming AS (
  SELECT
    (chunk->>'chunk_index')::int AS chunk_index,
    (chunk->>'page_number')::int AS page_number,
    trim(chunk->>'content') AS content
  FROM jsonb_array_elements('{{$json.chunks_json}}'::jsonb) AS chunk
),
inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO kb_chunks (source_id, chunk_index, page_number, content)
  SELECT
    {{$json.clean_source_id}} AS source_id,
    chunk_index,
    page_number,
    content
  FROM incoming
  ORDER BY chunk_index
  RETURNING 1
)
SELECT
  {{$json.clean_source_id}}::int       AS clean_source_id,
  '{{ String($json.clean_dest_path || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::text AS clean_dest_path,
  {{$json.chunk_count || 0}}::int      AS chunk_count,
  {{$json.chunk_text_length || 0}}::int AS chunk_text_length,
  {{$json.page_count || 0}}::int       AS page_count;
